com.pump.image.transition

Interface Transition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractClippedTransition2D, AbstractPlanarTransition2D, AbstractShapeTransition2D, AbstractTransition, BarsTransition2D, BlendTransition2D, BlindsTransition2D, BoxTransition2D, CheckerboardTransition2D, CircleTransition2D, CollapseTransition2D, CubeTransition3D, CurtainTransition2D, DiamondsTransition2D, DocumentaryTransition2D, DotsTransition2D, DropTransition2D, FlipTransition3D, FlurryTransition2D, FunkyWipeTransition2D, GooTransition2D, HalftoneTransition2D, KaleidoscopeTransition2D, LevitateTransition2D, MeshShuffleTransition2D, MicroscopeTransition2D, MirageTransition2D, MotionBlendTransition2D, PivotTransition2D, PushTransition2D, RadialWipeTransition2D, RefractiveTransition2D, RevealTransition2D, ReversedTransition, RotateTransition2D, ScaleTransition2D, ScribbleTransition2D, SlideTransition2D, SpiralTransition2D, SplitTransition2D, SquareRainTransition2D, SquaresTransition2D, StarsTransition2D, StarTransition2D, SwivelTransition2D, TossTransition2D, Transition2D, Transition3D, WaveTransition2D, WeaveTransition2D, WipeTransition2D, ZoomTransition2D

    public interface Transition
    This renders a transition between two images.

    • Method Detail

      • paint

        void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
           java.awt.image.BufferedImage frameA,
           java.awt.image.BufferedImage frameB,
           float progress)
        Parameters:
        g - the Graphics2D to render to.
        frameA - the first frame
        frameB - the second frame
        progress - a value between zero and one indicating how progressed this transition is.

        At progress = 0, frameA should be shown. At progress = 1, frameB should be shown.
